attributes.action: The UK government must close all US military bases on UK soil Immediately
attributes.additional_details:
The American administration can no longer be trusted or seen as an ally and should now be viewed as a hostile state.
The UK must throw all American service men and women out of the UK
attributes.background: The UK government should close all US military bases on UK soil with Immediate effect

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/717971
